titleStmt.title: A succinct narrative of the bloody murder of Sir Edmondbury Godfrey by the papists, Octob. 12. 1678. With the various and wonderful circumstances ... / by Captain William Bedloe, and Mr. Miles Prance ...
titleStmt.author: Bedloe, William, 1650-1680.
Prance, Miles, fl. 1678-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the use of Miles Prance,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
